name: Great, It’s the Pervy Neighbor. We’re Doomed
summary: Jiang Ran got tricked into moving into an apartment complex called Alice, where every single resident is some kind of killer or deranged criminal.Along with him, there were four others—they’re the 25th round of lab rats. Rich people are watching them live, placing bets on who dies first and who makes it to the end in this twisted survival game.In the apartment, there’s:- A psycho who likes skinning people to make kites.- A modern-day Jack the Ripper who only targets women.- A highly educated, high-IQ criminal mastermind.- And a chainsaw-wielding maniac with a thirst for blood.The system bound to Jiang Ran keeps screaming alerts:【Ding! Host is detected in an extremely dangerous zone! Run!】【Ding! Dangerous person detected nearby, RUN!】【Ding! Extremely dangerous individual detected nearby! Seriously, RUN!】Jiang Ran scratched his head, totally fed up:“System, you’re talking nonsense again. The neighbors are clearly all super nice and friendly, but you keep throwing dirt on them! You’re the worst!”“And anyway, there’s a gorgeous woman right next to me right now. How could she possibly be ‘extremely dangerous’?”
author: 吃人的妖怪
